original_text: Timothy, who is working together with me, says ‘hello’ to you. My relatives Lucius, Jason and Sosipater, also say ‘hello’ to you.
korean_text: 나의 동역자 디모데와 나의 친척 누기오와 야손과 소시바더가 너희에게 문안하느니라

sentences.original_text: Timothy, who is working together with me,
My relatives Lucius, Jason and Sosipater,
